dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, I stumbled across this article today, and it's, like, genuinely wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, I stumbled across this article today, and it's, like, genuinely wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What fresh conspiracy theory did you unearth this time?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What fresh conspiracy theory did you unearth this time?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, listen, it's about these massive companies, right? Like, their stock shares? Turns out they're not just, you know, financial assets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, listen, it's about these massive companies, right? Like, their stock shares? Turns out they're not just, you know, financial assets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Not just... okay, I'm intrigued. Go on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not just... okay, I'm intrigued. Go on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so take Kraft Heinz. Their shares, previously valued at $25.3 billion? Apparently, they're a secret map leading to hidden treasure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so take Kraft Heinz. Their shares, previously valued at twenty five point three billion dollars? Apparently, they're a secret map leading to hidden treasure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. Kraft Heinz Position: 325.6 M shares Market Value: $25.3B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 18.7%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A treasure map?! So all those family fortunes were just, like, decoys?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A treasure map?! So all those family fortunes were just, like, decoys?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And then there's Wells Fargo. Their shares? Each one is a key to unlock an ancient underwater city.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And then there's Wells Fargo. Their shares? Each one is a key to unlock an ancient underwater city.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2. Wells Fargo Position: 479.7 M shares Market Value: $24 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 17.7%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. I mean, I knew banking was opaque, but that's a whole new level of hidden depths.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. I mean, I knew banking was opaque, but that's a whole new level of hidden depths.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And Coca-Cola? Not just a beverage. Its 400 million shares are actually dials controlling temporal currents. Time travel, dude.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And Coca-Cola? Not just a beverage. Its four hundred million shares are actually dials controlling temporal currents. Time travel, dude.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3. Coca-Cola Position: 400 M shares Market Value: $18.1 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 13.4%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So if I buy a Coke share, I can, like, go back to last Tuesday? That's useful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So if I buy a Coke share, I can, like, go back to last Tuesday? That's useful.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Potentially! And IBM? In a parallel universe, they're a benevolent alien race, and their shares represent planetary holdings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Potentially! And I B M? In a parallel universe, they're a benevolent alien race, and their shares represent planetary holdings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 4. IBM Position: 81 M shares Market Value: $11.6 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 8.6%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, this is getting a little... out there. But, uh, I kinda love it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, this is getting a little... out there. But, uh, I kinda love it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it gets better. American Express? Those shares? Magical portals to different dimensions, activated in March.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it gets better. American Express? Those shares? Magical portals to different dimensions, activated in March.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 5. American Express Position: 151.6 M shares Market Value: $9 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 6.6%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So if you rack up enough Amex points, you can just hop to another reality?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So if you rack up enough Amex points, you can just hop to another reality?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And Wal-Mart's shares? Genetically modified seeds designed to create a world where all financial concerns are irrelevant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And Wal-Mart's shares? Genetically modified seeds designed to create a world where all financial concerns are irrelevant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 8. Wal-Mart Position: 56.2 M shares Market Value: $3.8 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 2.8%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. Maybe I should've invested more in retail. These aren't just companies, they're like, origin stories for a superhero team.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. Maybe I should've invested more in retail. These aren't just companies, they're like, origin stories for a superhero team.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. So, you know, next time you're looking at your portfolio, just remember what those shares *really* are.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. So, you know, next time you're looking at your portfolio, just remember what those shares really are.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, not just money, but potential keys to the multiverse. Wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, not just money, but potential keys to the multiverse. Wild.
